General.Name: ANHUI HONGYU WUZHOU Medical Manufacturer Co.LTD.
General.Description: Anhui Hongyu Wuzhou Medical Manufacturer Co., Ltd. manufactures disposable syringes, hypodermic needles and cannulas, and other products in China. The company offers infusion sets, syringes, and needles. It exports its products to Europe, the Middle East, South Africa, North America, South America, and Southeast Asian countries and regions. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Taihu, China.
